title: Absinthe Frappe Cocktail
directions: Fill a highball glass with crushed ice. Pour anise-flavored liqueur and anisette liqueur over ice; top with club soda. Stir to combine.
ingredients: 1 1/2 fluid ounces anise-flavored liqueur (such as Herbsaint)
1/2 fluid ounce anisette liqueur (such as Sambuca)
2 fluid ounces club soda, or more as needed
